title: There you are
lyrics:
there you are

appearing in my deepest dream

where nothing is white it seems

but you real

oh you real

but you are my everything
هذه انتي

يا أجمل احلامي

ياضي قدامي

وين اروح

ليه أروح

لغيرك ياحياتي
there you are

always there by my side

always there when I cry

baby you real

oh you real

but you are my everything
there you are

always there when I cry

oh you real

but you are my everything
there you are

appearing in my deepest dream

where nothing is white it seems
but you real

oh you real

but you are my everythin










استمع إلى "There you are" على أنغامي
